website_summaries.verdict: Certainly the best of the best, Perri's quality horse halter is easily fitted, comfortable, soft, durable, and stylish. If you’re in the market for a top-tier, long-term investment, we highly recommend it.
pros: Available in black or Havana colors
One size fits most adult horses
cons: This is an expensive horse halter, but it was handmade by Amish craftspeople using high-end materials

customer_reviews.title: Very large, but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The leather is good quality. It is a little stuff, but nothing that wont loosen up with time. However, the noseband is huge, and not adjustable, allowing the whole halter to fall backwards down the poll. I'm afraid a cob size would be too short and wouldn't fit correctly either. For reference- I had horse size on a 16.3 hh thoroughbred and the noseband was massive. Either size down or the same price you can find a leather halter with an adjustable noseband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Throatlatch not quite oversize enough
customer_reviews.text: I like Perri’s Leather goods so I ordered this halter for my draft cross. Unfortunately, it was too small in the throatlatch so I ended up selling it to another person at the barn who needed a new halter. It fit her warmblood perfectly. The leather and workmanship is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorlady

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but fit is large
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather, well finished, and fairly soft when you get it. Supples right up with a little oil and elbow grease. The fit is a little large, I have a ~1200 lb Appaloosa mare that I ordered a horse size for. Both sides are all the way up and it still hangs a little on her. She needs a turnout halter and because this one does fit big, it rubs. Not a ton, but it has left a couple small sores on her. I'm going to punch more holes to see if that fixes the size issue, but buyer beware, you may want to order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely halter, but it was larger than expected. I purchased the "horse" size for my daughter's 17.2 hand OTTB, who generally takes a large halter; and this was much too big in the nose. It would probably be okay for a warmblood or quarter horse. I should've purchased the adjustable nose band, but I like the clean look of the non-adjustable. Unfortunately it was a Christmas present purchased in early October, and I cannot return it due to it being outside of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: ASHughes317

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great halter. Used for turn out all summer and it held up great!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Good quality halter for the money. Black leather halters seem to be hard to find and I would recommend this. I put some conditioner on it to soften it up more, but it would have been acceptable without it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: halter
customer_reviews.text: well made halter. I am using it for a turn out halter, seems durable and is holding up well. Would definitely recommend
